name: T - Nicole Sonia
_source: speak;Nicole; Thank you there, darlin'.{w} More demons and undead{tgm}...{tgm}oh, it turns my stomach on its head!
speak;Sonia; Just stay behind me.{w} Your squishy body wasn't meant to take attacks from these monsters.
speak;Nicole; Oh honey, that's easy to say when you're as tall as the watchtowers,{w} with arms the size of tree trunks!
speak;Sonia; I don't know what you're talking about,{w} but you should just stay out of the action.
speak;Nicole; Trust me sugar, ain't nobody gotta tell me twice.{w} I'm not going belly up here.
